Reviews.Title: “Great location but in need of updating”
Reviews.Author: Simon T
Reviews.Content: hotel comfortable walking distance station canalside central location canalview furniture double glazing thin walls noisy bed comfortable sink plug day none materialised fan ensuite didnt wet steamy shower breakfast disappointing 10 euros person extra morning worth excellent breakfasts available restaurants locality hotel location looks feels tired definitely modernisation visit amsterdam looking hotel

Reviews.Title: “Outdated but comfortable”
Reviews.Author: ceedie
Reviews.Content: initially arrived hotel closed door locked inside building dark front door stated hotel amsterdam soon found actual hotel little walk door tried suggested arrow door actual hotel tourists didnt confused arrived hotel putting boiler told couple hours hot water unfortunately true able hot shower following day initially 2nd floor overlooking canal husband door occupied 3rd floor clean decorated red compensated mixup getting 2nd days breakfast free wood flooring king size bed single bed free internet tv desk chair 2 nightstands bed 2 windows overlooked canal bathroom narrow clean shower hot water elevator lift somewhat scary afraid getting stuck narrow curvy staircase instead hotel lift updated furnishings somewhat homey feel breakfast free day cost 10 euros 2 days free elsewhere eat didnt feel worth money mainly continental style breakfast pastries cereals own eggs fresh coffee assorted teas staff manning desk nice friendly accommodating hotel location walking distance city center night staff taxi departure waiting happier overall nice stay quirks location definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A little gem”

Reviews.Content: gem hotel perfectly located amstel scenic corner amsterdam city centre doorstep book left previous supposedly upmarket hotel disappointing experience able remaining rest stay name suggests hotel homely stylish casual informal sort character lovely view canal decoration little wornout showerroom floor clean flipflops otherwise hotel five stars breakfast excellent comprehensive free day 10 euros cook own eggs staff friendly helpful genuinely ensure stay little noise street night route rembrandtplein red light district guess expected saturday night concern little maintenance stop decor deteriorating time regret couldnt stay stayed business hotels amsterdam little nicer antidote corporate glitz hotel chains definitely stay recommending hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “we loved it!”

Reviews.Content: lovely tram day walked matter 20 minutes location views canal floors 23 4 staff outstanding warm helpful hotel charming expected 3 updated bit happy bed comfortable night sleep somtimes beacuse life canal noisy vere cleaned ours vaccummed day oh elevator 20 hours travel hotel photo accurate

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel in perfect location”
Reviews.Author: christineandrob Posted by a Viaggiare traveler
Reviews.Content: arrival warmly welcomed upgraded lovely overlooking amstel clean teacoffee facilities sheets towels clean changed daily staff friendly feel offering breakfast 1pm late hotel situated quiet short walk perfect couple days thanks staff experience amsterdam remember august

Reviews.Title: “good all round”
Reviews.Author: revpetermcdowell
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights found location greateasy walk owners friendly helpful vouchers free breakfast day 1 nice 10 canal view bath attic roomno 44 head bed 2 feet wall allow bathroom owner change lovely 2 windows overlooking comfortable bed warmthe hotel soundproofed definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, great location, friendly helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: LauritaUk
Reviews.Content: family booked weekend birthday lovely stay central location able walk relatively quiet nice breakfast loved own omlettes hot plate cute heron begged cheese outside window wonderful friendly helpful staff complaints couldnt stayed thank

Reviews.Title: “Fun Stay and Experience”

Reviews.Content: definately experience staying amsterdam stayed houseboat actual hotel building check easy directions shops supermarkets restaurants tram stations nearby christmas market street bars nearby houseboat hear people leaving bars clubs street noise canal traffic loud boathouse adults baby drafts bedroom december bitter cold summer am bearable definately stay recommend experience

Reviews.Content: apt located 7 doors hotel 3 4 apt rented helpful completely disorganized person apts email confirm giving rate building hotel somehow affiliated extra towels crib etc fantastic staff apt 2 building 7 shabby bedrooms huge living amazing view valid attempt clean pretty run apt flights steep stairs elevator help bags stay fantastic location apt real kitchen view canal family free wireless internet paid 235 euro night

Reviews.Title: “Interesting and welcoming hotel in an ideal position overlooking Amstel”
Reviews.Author: CalellaDePalafrugell
Reviews.Content: friendly welcome arrived hotel wasnt oneoff lady feel home days stayed line reviews hotel redecoration upgrading positives return dont serve evening meals restaurants nearby wasnt nice returning hotel glass wine bed gentle jazz classic fm playing background breakfast excellent classic fm playing background interestingly heron arrived morning breakfast cheese hotel ideally situated overlooking amstel quiet road hardly traffic near boat trips flower market

Reviews.Title: “Extremely friendly service but hotel upkeep could stand some slight improvement.”
Reviews.Author: rohit2561
Reviews.Content: nice hotel excellent view canal staff helpful friendly breakfast hotel upkeep single bed solo travellers size huge bed unnecessary business travellers taking 70 floor space

Reviews.Title: “Too expensive for a tiny room”
Reviews.Author: MiaMew
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights paid 315 euros own fault booked minute couldnt cheaper price public holiday holland canal view tiny tired looking service friendly helpful staff night breakfast free delicious wide selection food location near quiet street id love stay hotel due services location price pay

Reviews.Title: “Cute Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: taki143
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed based recommendation parents stayed 2 prior hotel eureka agency booked directly day arrival call skype available double hotel cost 120 euro night including incredible breakfast free day stay little cute cosy bathroom clean staff friendly helpful especially guy morning serving breakfast eager impression location overlooking amstel nice outside night close action amsterdam note boutique hotels elevator due incredibly narrow stairwells amsterdam definitely stay id book little advance secure canal view
